general package

general.utils module

general.utils.get_data_from_json_map(json_data, json_map)[source]

Retrieves data from a nested JSON structure using a dot-separated path.

Parameters:

  • json_data – The nested JSON data.

  • json_map – A dot-separated string representing the path to the desired data.

Returns:

The data at the specified path, or None if the path is invalid.

general.core module

general.core.log_timing(func: Callable) → Callable[source]

Decorator to log the execution time of a function.

Parameters:

func – The function to decorate.

Returns:

The decorated function.

general.pydantic_models module

class general.pydantic_models.BoundingBox(*, page_number: int, box: dict)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

A Pydantic model representing a bounding box on a specific page.

box: dict
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

page_number: int
